notes.en: Every World Cities Day, children in the United States celebrate by dressing up in costumes and roaming through cities.  They make sure to stop at every house and demand candy from strangers.  Older people view World Cities Day as a good reason to throw parties.

If the UN collectively cared about the â€œPalestiniansâ€, they would have long ago resettled those Arabs abandoned behind enemy lines in the Arab attempts to annihilate Israel rather than keeping them as â€œrefugeesâ€ for generations and teaching them hatred and fantasies of conquering Israel that will never happen.
